metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28200 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: The Sieve engine in Dovecot before 2.3.15 allows Uncontrolled Resource Consumption, as demonstrated by a situation with a complex regular expression for the regex extension.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream, fixing this is a massive change that cannot be backported to earlier releases

criterions.comment: dovecot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
